eventDecorators.name: AggregatorProposed
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the implementation returned by the beacon is changed.

eventDecorators.name: AggregatorUpgraded
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the implementation returned by the beacon is changed.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferRequested
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the implementation returned by the beacon is changed.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the implementation returned by the beacon is changed.

eventDecorators.name: ProposedAggregatorValidateCall
eventDecorators.description: The proposed aggregator called validate, but the call was not passed on to any validators. Emitted when the implementation returned by the beacon is changed.

eventDecorators.name: ValidatorProposed
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the implementation returned by the beacon is changed.

eventDecorators.name: ValidatorUpgraded
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the implementation returned by the beacon is changed.

functionDecorators.name: acceptOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows an ownership transfer to be completed by the recipient.

functionDecorators.name: proposeNewAggregator
functionDecorators.description: Propose an aggregator. A zero address can be used to unset the proposed aggregator. Only owner can call.

functionDecorators.name: proposeNewValidator
functionDecorators.description: Propose an validator. A zero address can be used to unset the proposed validator. Only owner can call.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows an owner to begin transferring ownership to a new address, pending.

functionDecorators.name: upgradeAggregator
functionDecorators.description: Upgrade the aggregator by setting the current aggregator as the proposed aggregator. Must have a proposed aggregator. Only owner can call.

functionDecorators.name: upgradeValidator
functionDecorators.description: Upgrade the validator by setting the current validator as the proposed validator. Must have a proposed validator. Only owner can call.

functionDecorators.name: validate
functionDecorators.description: Validate a transmission. Must be called by either the `s_currentAggregator.target`, or the `s_proposedAggregator`. If called by the `s_currentAggregator.target` this function passes the call on to the `s_currentValidator.target` and the `s_proposedValidator`, if it is set. If called by the `s_proposedAggregator` this function emits a `ProposedAggregatorValidateCall` to signal that the call was received.
